dict.acceptation: 任命，委派；约定，指定；装设，布置；

sent.orig: Disappear appoint examine passin a leisurely way appoint oneself thing, this is basic program error.
sent.trans: 消委查消委自己的事情，这是基本的程序错误。

sent.orig: A purchaser can appoint his own solicitors.
Old foreign-policy hands argue that it is foolish to appoint somebody you cannot sack.
sent.trans: 一些资深外交人士认为，任命无法驾驭的人是愚蠢的。

sent.orig: Appoint an evil man to oppose him; let an accuser stand at his right hand.
sent.trans: 6愿你派一个恶人辖制他，派一个对头站在他右边。

sent.orig: The arbitration commission shall appoint asarbitrators.
sent.trans: 仲裁委员会的章程应当依照本法制定。
